DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : WASHINGTON ; MIDEAST MISSION
DOC.TEXT: Secretary_of_State Warren Christopher is scheduled to head for the Middle_East on Sunday to continue his attempt to broker a peace_treaty between the region ' s most implacable foes -- Israel and Syria . Israeli and Syrian officials have not met face to face for months , so all negotiations are handled through U.S. mediators . Christopher plans to meet with both Israeli Prime_Minister Yitzhak Rabin and Syrian President Hafez Assad . A senior U.S. official says the talks between Israel and Syria " are more serious , more detailed than ever before. " But , he adds , a breakthrough " is not imminent , I can tell you that. "
